mapper.select: select video_id, video_name, video_intro, video_edittime, video_islive, video_url, video_oriurl, video_thumbnailurl, video_remark, category_id, videostate_id from video where video_id=#{id}

select v.video_id, v.video_name, v.video_intro, v.video_edittime, v.video_islive, v.video_url, v.video_oriurl, v.video_thumbnailurl, v.video_remark, v.videostate_id, c.category_id, c.category_name, c.category_parentid, c.category_remark from video v inner join category c on v.category_id = c.category_id where v.video_id = #{id}

select v.video_id, v.video_name, v.video_intro, v.video_edittime, v.video_islive, v.video_url, v.video_oriurl, v.video_thumbnailurl, v.video_remark, v.category_id, v.videostate_id, c.videostate_order, c.videostate_cssstyle, c.videostate_name, c.videostate_remark from video v inner join videostate c on v.videostate_id = c.videostate_id where c.videostate_order = #{order}
